characteristic.__text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Hero^^** to be the target. You cannot pick the same **^^Hero^^** to be the target of this ability more than once per battle.’

For the rest of the turn, the following effects apply to friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** units while they are wholly within 18" of the target:
• Add 1 to charge rolls for those units.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those units’ melee weapons.
**^^Waaagh!^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit that was not set up this turn to be the target.
The target can move up to 3". It can move into combat. If it was in combat at the start of the move, it must end that move in combat.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
The target’s melee weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 9" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

profile._name: Da Great Big Green Hand of Gork

characteristic.__text: Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the target is a **^^Wizard^^**, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target instead.
Add 10 to this unit’s control score.
This unit has **^^Ward (6+)^^**.
Deployment Phase
Pick 1 of this unit’s weapons. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle.
Friendly **^^Ironjawz Infantry^^** units have **^^Ward (6+)^^** while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **^^Ironjawz Wizards^^** or **^^Priests^^**.
If you make an unmodified charge roll of 8+ for a friendly non-**^^Hero Ironjawz^^** unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.
Add the number of enemy units that have been destroyed this battle to the Move characteristic of friendly **Gore-gruntas** and **^^Maw-grunta^^** units, to a maximum of +4.

The first time each turn that an enemy unit is destroyed by a **^^Fight^^** ability used by a friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by the next friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit that is picked to use a **^^Fight^^** ability for the rest of the turn.
Any Charge Phase
If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If this unit’s unmodified charge roll this turn was 8+, roll a D6 instead of a D3.
If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.
Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit wholly within 12" of this unit
If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.

Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to charge rolls for the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.
**^^Prayer^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick up to 2 eligible units to be the targets instead of 1
**^^Prayer^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ironjawz Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Ironjawz^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
**Heal (D6)** the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, **Heal (D3+3)** the target instead.
**^^Prayer^^**
